rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Gulan love their national
instrument, the Torigonda!

rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But it's so hard to hit the right notes,
and I'm starting to get fed up of hearing
it. I want to play something else now...

rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Wouldn't it be nice if Gula started
collaborating with other cultures to
make some totally new instrument?

rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I bet they'd come up with something
really weird and unique.

rows.label: tlk41200126_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Hopefully not TOO weird, though.
No point if you can't get a decent
tune out of it...
